Dear Schooley:
We would like to get responses from as many of the state supported
institutions as possible on their operations in the field of programming
at the elementary school level for in-school listening* Since you are
a busy man, we are attempting to make this survey as simple as possible*
We would like short, snappy answers to three questions*
1* Does your radio station have an in-school program* If the answer is
,,non we don*t need anything further.
2. If the answer is ”yes,n please give us an estimate on the amount of
money spent on in-school programming, including the time spent in
writing scripts and producing programs as well as money spent for
teacher manuals, promotion material, etc*
3* If the answer is Hyes,n please give us any information you have
available concerning adult listening to in-school programs* You can
send as much or as little information as your time permits, but some
indication as to your adult audience, if any, would be helpful.
We hope you will be able to send us something on this phase of your
activities, whatever they may be. A copy of the summary will be mailed
to you if you indicate your desire for one on the enclosed form.
Sincerely y ours,
